page.title: 18UNITS AT RAF BRIZE NORTON
page.content: There are over 3000 personnel at R.A.F. Brize Norton.Many work to support the Flying Squadrons in such roles as Air Traffic Control,supply, engineering, and administration. There are some independent units.{The Joint {Air Transport Establishment}researches and develops equipment & air transport procedures.{Tactical Communications {Wing}supports all the services with field communications and full airfield & navigation aids.{No. 241 Operational {Conversion Unit}is responsible for training aircrew on VC_10 aircraft.The {Air Movements School}provides specialist training for personnel working on air & surface movements of men and material.{No.1 Parachute {Training School}trains airborne forces of all 3 services. Instructors form the famous{Falcons}display team which performs around the world.
